sections.heading: Commissioner; supervise tax collections
sections.text: It is hereby made the duty of the Tax Commissioner to supervise and enforce collections of all taxes that may be due under the provisions of sections 57-701 to 57-714.SourceLaws 1955, c. 219, ยง 12, p. 613;Laws 1967, c. 351, ยง 8, p. 935.
